feed.title: File Browser Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.34.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 70d59ec03ed3fa9c99cf9151037367a534559145 chore(release): 2.34.1
  • bf37f88c32222ad9c186482bb97338a9c9b4a93c fix: passthrough the minimum password length (#5236)
  • 7354eb6cf966244141277c2808988855c004f908 fix: exclude to-be-moved folder from move dialog (#5235)
  • 10684e5390f10815e70ad72d2e23cf7e599c6d0a docs: bring the maintenance warning higher in the page
  • 58fe81734931c3453f328f765fd1ad4258b1ccce docs: add link to contributing and license in readme

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.34.2
entry.content:
Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • d1a73a8b18e15aec7febe661dc51ff0da56c5170 chore(release): 2.34.2
  • 2b5d6cbb996a61a769acc56af0acc12eec2d8d8f fix: mitigate unprotected shares
  • 364f391017628adb09d70e77dfb3092227403e9d docs: cleanup installation
  • c13861e13cc183e72a029cb0af9885b412e466db docs: clarify admin password
  • e6b750add5d2f3b899b335bba133cfc9681cf38c chore: make more fields in bug report mandatory

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.35.0

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.36.0
entry.content:
Updated Icons

This is especially important for those using the branding customization to override the icons and logotype. We have removed deprecated icons that are no longer needed.

The following icons have been removed: - mstile-* - safari-pinned-tab.svg - favicon-16x16.png - favicon-32x32.png

The following icons have been added: - favicon.svg

Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • 0c34b79a9937b970f2259e37d1f33bab2bddbfab chore(release): 2.36.0
  • 04166e81e52d38b1f66ba3313ccb1291c239eea2 feat: update icons, remove deprecated Microsoft Tiles
  • fae410ce6e7727ee7dab63479a6f08eec15fe5a4 docs: improve custom branding info
  • 9da01be7fc34eeae4a2d0518645769d2614dd554 docs: add update instructions to Docker
  • e9e7c68557b2d54b51185771aa092f0f259ee680 chore: remove symlink in Dockerfile
